overview: Gaming fan Marc chooses to play Grand Theft and is catapulted into a wicked world where he can steal cars and get off with gorgeous ladies of the night such as foxy Michelle Moist!  Sexy Sasha Rose plays a very naughty superhero game where the penalty for losing against the end-of-level boss is to submit to his every dirty desire. Can we have a go next?  Kai is a geeky gamer who loves using a Sims-style game to create a James Bond-type life for himself - where he gets to enjoy virtual sex with Hannah Shaw and Lexi Ward!  Dean Van Damme and Lucy Love play an epic shoot-em-up* but when Lucy loses a life her studly boyfriend gets to enjoy the favours of the game's sexy villainess! Guest appearance from Liselle Bailey.  Seb Cam finds himself in mortal combat with sexy streetfighter Megan. The pair fight three rounds against incredible 2D backgrounds before things get decidedly XXX-rated.
title: Better Than Life
